main.name: Iván Romero Oyola
main.bio: I am a Full Stack Web Developer, driven by a desire to learn new things and see how they make a difference. At Ironhack, I had the chance to learn fast and implement my own ideas, as well as work in a diverse team of more than 20 students. My short-term goals are: I am Interested in full-stack web development. Improve my programming and logic skills, know and master all the technologies I can, find a good job and make new friends with colleagues.
